activities: Alchemy Systems offers a group based and individual training solution targeted primarily within the food industry.  Alchemy collects information under the direction of its Clients, and has no direct or business relationship with the individuals whose personal data it processes.  Instead the Alchemy business relationship is with the company at which the individuals are employed.  This data is collected for the sole purpose of processing employee training data to be used by the client company.  The training data is only used by the client company.  Alchemy Systems does not share client data with any third party.  All client company data is retained for backup purposes for a period of 2 years.
